channel.title: BD News - Artho Suchak
channel.description: Latest news from Bangladeshi newspapers (1 articles)

item.title: Saimon Overseas Cleared of Money Laundering Allegations
item.description: Saimon Overseas Limited has been officially cleared of allegations of money laundering after an investigation by the Ministry of Civil Aviation and Tourism found the claims to be false, unfounded, and misleading. According to informed sources, a vested interest group allegedly carried out a planned smear campaign against the company following its strong stance against long-standing irregularities in the air ticketing market. These irregularities include anonymous group bookings and prolonged sea...
